text: The beautiful CHIMING SOUNDS OF SPACE TRAVEL through the COSMOS... DOTS OF LIGHT whiz past our face. They could be stars at lightspeed, or... SUBWAY LIGHTS FLICKER ON - in a flash we see PALE, SULLEN FACES, riding into a bleak future, and hear the INDUSTRIAL CLATTER. It' dark, claustrophobic, obscure... the rhythmic beat of tra and wheel-clicks engulf us. The lights flicker back on an hold as we see a half dozen SOLDIERS in BROWN CAMO, steel eyed, prepared for whatever may be at the end of the TUNN ZERO IN on TWO: KABLE, 30-something, roughneck... focused, determined; ey burning with internalized emotion... ... and SANDRA, late 20s, undeniably hot but tough as hel both are in shackles & cuffs, being roughly transported through underground tunnels, knocked and shoved around. Uniformed GUARDS roam the train, looking pissed off - the swagger seems to mask FEAR. KABLE is meditating, or exhausted - hard to tell.   The G makes eye contact w/ him.
Sandra.
KABLE says nothing, just stares at her, stoic. SANDRA (cont'd) My name is Sandra.
Shut the fuck up.
Because he can, the GUARD takes a swing at KABLE'S head w a BILLY CLUB... CRACK!
KABLE'S skull snaps back into the window. The GUARD swing again, this time nailing KABLE square in the stomach.
(to the GUARD, a snarl)
Putcher dick away...

Get some. CRACKK!! CRACK!! CRACKK!! ... CRACK!!     SANDRA is buckl over, awkwardly, hands behind her back tethered to the se head dripping blood. KABLE jerks against his restraints, every inch of him wanting to RIP THE MOTHERFUCKER APART.. He uses his elbow to help her back up, but SANDRA fights through it, sits back up and spits blood - she can handle herself. The CAMERA holds TIGHT on KABLE and SANDRA... KABLE lets glob of blood dangle from his mouth, biting his lip, bear it... we hear the CRUNCHING SOUND of the CLUB working on others... and the METALLIC RUMBLE and CLATTER of the TRAI growing louder, POUNDING, slamming into our brains, blott out all thought... until...

POV: we are RUNNING, ragged, full sprint, down a TUNNEL towards dirty white DAYLIGHT... NO MUSIC - just heavy breath, KABLE'S HEARTBEAT and the s of his boots bouncing off the concrete... Others are running with us - SOLDIERS with weapons... at tunnel's end: vaguely defined shapes of buildings, smoke, sky... Our POV WHITES OUT as we...
... smash into the DAYLIGHT. Smoke plumes hang from a recent skirmish. KABLE climbs ov burning debris, gun raised, as SANDRA and the other soldi disappear into the grey mist.
KABLE emerges from the smoke into...

... a DESTROYED CITY - PHILLY? DETROIT? NY? Seemingly out of character, he LEAPS THROUGH THE AIR SLO-MO and lands i OVERDRAMATIC, ROCKSTAR POSE (Nine Inch Nails, Coachella 2005). In sequence, multicolored LEDs on his weapon COME TO LIFE accompanied by a low frequency hum that seems to pierce somewhere below human hearing. The MULTIPLE TURRETS spin, then snap into place. GO TIME.
Other BROWN SOLDIERS emerge like SNAKES out of DIRT HOLES INTO THE LIGHT. They crouch and spread out.

What appear like BUZZING FLIES swarm thru the grey air - closer look, they are like tiny BALL BEARINGS that move l hummingbirds, magnetically controlled. The swarm splits apart - each FLY connects with a different SOLDIER - they hover one foot above and two feet behind the SOLDIER'S he

KABLE slides behind a shredded telephone pole and TAKES COVER. The sound of trains, weapons, soldiers all fade away... until... NOTHING.   DEAD QUIET. SUDDENLY - A BULLET WHIZZES by KABLE's face - a pause - T we hear a GUNSHOT. Another BULLET WHIRS by his leg and another by his should after the bullets pass, we hear the GUNSHOTS. See the lightning, wait for the thunder. In the peripheral a SOLDIER in DEEP BLUE CAMO runs from behind an old car to a brick staircase.   Then another BL runs the opposite way, closer in the foreground. BROWNS V BLUES?? The SILENCE is crawling, deafening, and then... BOOM. ALL HELL BREAKS LOOSE. Suddenly we are in IRAQ TIMES TEN. KABLE'S eyes glance down at his WEAPON - the turrets quic shift and rotate - he whips it up in a flash and RETURNS into the mist: THOOM! THOOM!   The shells puncture air and connect distantly...
The air ripples all around him, his world closing in... h breaks free and runs toward an open street - THE TURRETS READJUST - he efficiently wastes two BLUES with automatic fire.

A couple of PEDESTRIANS walk across the street, totally IGNORING THE VIOLENCE. KABLE makes a perfect 90 degree cu and wraps around a street-lamp and into the alley. A BUM holds out a can with a couple of coins and SHAKES it. From an aerial POV we see the area swarming with BROWN & combatants and a dozen CIVILIANS.   In the top right corn of our frame we see the DULL REFLECTION of a FACE, somewh transparent, watching the battle, tungsten red (similar t your own reflection on a TV). We SNAP BACK to the ground - the whole area is a BATTLEZO KABLE lines up another BLUE climbing the fire-escape to t third floor window - and then, coming from the REAR SURRO SPEAKERS, behind us: A VOICE - almost a whisper, too clean and distinct to be outdoors in this environment... and TOO YOUNG to possibly belong to KABLE.
(clean, disconnected)

Eat shit please. THWIPPP!! The BLUE drops like a sack. KABLE perfectly cut back another 90 degrees and runs for an old store front. Inside a CLERK "air" bags groceries for an empty store. A BROWN SOLDIER sets up a TRIPOD MACHINE GUN and aims for bunker a hundred yards north. The distant BLUE targets se almost robotically unaware. The BROWN SOLDIER plants his left hand on the ground for stability, right hand twistin the grip-lock - and squeezing the trigger: TAT TAT TAT TA TAT TAT!!!! TATATATATATATATATA TAT!! The BLUES fall, some clumsily colliding into each other before they crash to t ground, dead. Another team of BLUES rock their heads around to focus on him. Uh oh... BOOOOOSH!!!! The BROWN TRIPOD GUNNER is vaporized from th knees up... the FOREARM that supported him is standing straight up, cleanly severed at the elbow. It slowly wobb over and connects with the TWO LEGS severed at the knees. The THREE LIMBS fall into each other, forming a flesh and bone TRIPOD.
THE DESTRUCTION, pushing the bodies and debris out of the and clearing a path, one streaked with crimson red and bu flesh. It moves fast and vanishes into the smoke clouds.

Down the road, KABLE saves an EAST-INDIAN WOMAN from gett obliterated by shoving her out of the way of the blazing truck. As KABLE turns to waste another BLUE, the EAST-IND WOMAN gets right back up... walking into and getting obliterated by another TRUCK.   It's creepy - robotic, bu violent and too real - like a programmed suicide.
Can't say I didn't try...
We sense emotion in KABLE'S cold eyes - then they flicker the peripheral.
Tracking along a row of blown out windows a BLUE is takin aim; we SNAP ZOOM in...
The transparent GHOST OF A FACE, as though projected on glass. The LIPS MOVE in sync with:
Shit! Shit!
KABLE spins, TOO LATE - BUT: from the level directly below the SNIPER - through a open doorway - we see a BROWN SOLDIER, BLASTING STRAIGHT THROUGH THE CEILING! The BLUE is BLOWN TO CHUNKS.

The BROWN runs out and hits the curb; CONCRETE AND MEAT collapse on the spot where she stood... it's SANDRA. KABLE gives her covering fire as she heads his way. They bolt for a corner - KABLE reaches protection first. He st to let SANDRA catch up, and in that instant - HER BRAINS GET BLOWN TO JELL-O.          Blood and partic over KABLE's gear.
Suckage.

Without hesitation KABLE turns and wastes two more BLUES. Up ahead HE SEES IT: an OCTAGON STEEL SHED with small GLOWING EMERALD GREEN WINDOWS. He makes for it. The little FLY following him is picked out of the air by stray shot - PLINK! VOICE (O.S.) (cont'd) ... what the...!

Bullets and shells chop up everything around KABLE, but h QUICK... A SHELL smacks his shoulder HARD, almost knocking him off feet - shredding the BROWN CAMO and revealing the FLEXIBL BODY ARMOR UNDERNEATH. He scrambles to the octagon's entrance and BAILS IN.

KABLE steps into the middle of the vacant steel room. The second he breaks the GREEN LASER, FLOOD LIGHTS blast on a around the BATTLEFIELD. A SUBMARINE ALARM sounds from loudspeakers everywhere, echoing through the streets, CYC DOWN. The battle is over - session complete.

KABLE steps out.    The LEDS on his weapon blink off in sequence... ARMED GUARDS are EVERYWHERE, rounding up the I-Con's. [I-CONs (I-Convicts) are the combatants -- death row inmates/lifers, of which there are never a shortage. GENERI-CON's (Generic Convicts) are the street traffic th lend unpredictability and realism to the battlefield... t are computer controlled NPCs (non player characters)... p thiefs and criminals who are risking their lives by participating to commute their sentences] A DOZEN GUARDS collect weapons - TWO approach KABLE. His eyes are pure MURDER; SANDRA'S brain matter still drips f him.

head_text.subj: HE WHIPS UP THE WEAPON, POINTS IT AT A GUARD'S HEAD AND P

text: NOTHING. The GUARD doesn't even flinch. The WEAPON is DEA dormant; they all knew it. The GUARDS have a good LAUGH... KABLE is CLUBBED from beh we...
Back on the rattling TRAIN, where we started. The SURVIVI SOLDIERS - both BROWN and BLUE - are shackled to the rail wounded, exhausted, hollow eyed.
Good run, Kable.
KABLE only looks to the floor.
(quietly) My name's Tillman.
Whatever your name is. You got to the save point fast.
So the fuck what? No one's getting out of here alive.
I am.   I'm going to make it.
The cynical BROWN just shakes his head.
Sure you will.
(tuning the BROWN out, turning his attention to KABLE) They say you only got three battles left til you get out...

KABLE says nothing. The CAMERA pushes in on a TATTOO on his forearm: a simple outline of a black box with the words inside: I AM RIGHT WITH YOU. [MUSIC: Aldo Nova, "LIFE IS JUST A FANTASY" kicks in...]
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007

A spartan, underground LAB. A PLAIN-CLOTHES TECH sits on a stool holding a simple REM on the table next to him is a SMALL METAL DISH. In front him, floating in the air, is one of the little metallic FLIES. He pokes at it - it instantly jukes left; again - it juke right... almost faster than the eye can follow. No way he could ever touch it. Semi-satisfied, he holds out the metal dish and clicks th remote. The FLY drops into the dish - CLINK. CLOSE-UP: the little gunmetal ball is black and dented on side - probably the one we saw get knocked out of the air There is a PINHOLE GLASS LENS on the other end. The TECH picks it up with thumb and forefinger and holds lens up to his eyes. Switch to: POV of the FLY CAM: the TECH'S face, extreme wide angle, examining. The image flickers, glitches - then CUTS TO: WHITE NOISE.
A CONSOLE of MONITORS cut from FUZZ to GRAPHICS. and PRODUCERS scramble... it's SHOWTIME. OFFSCREEN VOICE
Counting down five... four... three... two... SWISH PAN and SNAP ZOOM across the room, through an open door, to the CORRIDOR, where...
A REPORTER - GINA PARKER SMITH, sexy eager-beaver, focuse a NEWS EXEC, 40s, and a CHIEF OF STAFF, 60s are walking briskly along in a heated discussion. CHIEF OF STAFF
Do we have the damn interview or don't we?
We're cunt hair close -
I can't blow off the Three-Asian War for "close".
All respect, Bob, nobody cares about dead Orientals... they care about Ken Castle -
May I hear from Gina please?
GINA spins on him, looks CHIEF straight in the eyeballs.
OK, Bob? Bob. You realize Castle has clocked exactly - one - media appearance to date and that was Walters' last interview before she died - NINE FUCKING YEARS AGO!
Stop menstruating, just tell me we fucking have it -
We fucking have it!

The CHIEF OF STAFF bangs open a conference room door with fist as they blow by - veers off and disappears. GINA rol her eyes in disgust, keeps moving. GINA PARKER SMITH (cont'd) Palindromes. (she STOPS) Hold on. Focus: let's get lunch. Sushi, Iranian, or Mexican?
Burger chili fry?
(considering) I'll freak a burger.
FREEZE FRAME on GINA - ZOOM and...
GINA'S BURGER-FREAKING face becomes part of an ANIMATED T SEQUENCE.
with GINA PARKER SMITH

In this context it looks like she's freaking serious worl affairs. NOTE: this telecast will play much faster than the page c indicates - hyped up, quick cutting, overlapping dialog, A.D.D. and hyper-caffeinated.
First... there was society...

Shots of several dozen young, trendily dressed people (we talking trends that haven't yet been invented) wandering robotically around a BACKLOT-LOOKING CITY STREET, occasionally bumping into one another... the graphic soci LOGO superimposed. VOICEOVER (cont'd) The ultimate SIM environment - where players don't control virtual animated characters - but actual, living, breathing human beings.

People are dancing, MAKING OUT on street corners... someo tries to eat an ICE CREAM CONE, misses his mouth and poke into his eye. VOICEOVER (cont'd) (quoting) They walked them, they talked them. They juiced them...
A HOT YOUNG GIRL in a WET T-SHIRT is SLAMMING a BOTTLE of JAGER. VOICEOVER (cont'd) They rocked them.
A MIDDLE-AGED GUY in a shirt and tie is HEADBANGING FURIO like an extra in a TWISTED SISTER VIDEO. VOICEOVER (cont'd) We all remember the slogan.
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007

SWITCH TO: ROWS OF PEOPLE in front of wall-sized VIDEO MONITORS, transfixed, doing a kind of sign language with their hands... JAPANESE lining up around the block... COLLEGE STUDENTS and OFFICE WORKERS glued to screens... VOICEOVER (cont'd)

The creation of reclusive genius Ken Castle, society took the world by storm, becoming the number one guilty pleasure of billions, either playing or watching... and generating one of the world's largest private fortunes, surpassing Steve Jobs and Bill Gates practically overnight. A FILE-FOOTAGE CLIP of KEN CASTLE - 30s, fresh and boyish Southern molasses accent - being interviewed on a news sh KEN CASTLE
I ain't complainin'! FREEZE on CASTLE... the IMAGE DISTORTS in THREE DIMENSION offset red and blue channels shifting.

Nine months ago, Castle unveiled a new simulation - one that would take gaming to new heights of thrilling excess... and controversy - SLAYERS. SLAYERS LOGO over a slo-mo shot of BROWN and BLUE soldier walking towards CAMERA - BADASS, with BIG MOTHERFUCKING WEAPONS slung at their sides... VOICEOVER (cont'd)

If society let us live thru others... SLAYERS would let us die thru others. Slick edited COMBAT FOOTAGE from the BATTLEFIELD. Explosions, flame throwers, bullet hits... DUDES screamin unloading MASS ROUNDS... VOICEOVER (cont'd)

Slayers gives the gamer full control of a flesh and blood human being in full scale, kill-or-be- killed combat. And when we say flesh and blood, we mean flesh - A QUICK CUT of a BROWN'S ARM BEING BLOWN OFF.
VOICEOVER (cont'd)
... and blood. An RPG EXPLODES - CHUNKS smack the lens and OOZE DOWN.

CASTLE is opposite GINA PARKER SMITH, both identified by translucent animated CHYRONS. CASTLE is older now than in the earlier clip; early 40s - his body is more solid; hai cut shorter, conservative. But the eyes still SPARKLE.
Slayers. KEN CASTLE (big smile)
Slayers. CASTLE'S accent is like pure Georgia honey.           He' ribbed charmer. GINA PARKER SMITH (down to business)
Why isn't it murder? She leans in, playing the role of hard-hitting reporter t T. KEN CASTLE
Gina, when was the last time you saw someone volunteer to be murdered? I'm sure you know that every last one of our Slayers is a bona fide death row inmate - (points for emphasis)
...each one offered a chance to participate as an alternative to their sentence. Stay alive for thirty sessions and get set free... that's not a bad God damned deal. GINA PARKER SMITH
I see - and has any one of these men or women ever actually survived long enough to be set free? KEN just smiles, locks in on her eyes.

I'd remind your audience that Slayers was put together with the full cooperation and approval of the United States federal government... that the revenue it produces is responsible for funding our entire prison system - keeping the bad guys behind bars... and that the prop was voted for by a cock solid 68% of the American public.
(to BOARD OP) What'd he say?
... in an election tainted by suspected digital fraud... (changing gears) let's talk about the so-called generi-cons.

VIDEO: a montage of slayers "civilians" - the bum shaking can in the midst of chaos, a group of pedestrians walking robotically into a wall of flame, store clerks "air-baggi groceries... GINA PARKER SMITH (cont'd) Sent into the slayers environment with a set of pre-programmed actions, with no way to react and no one controlling them - their chances of survival are next to nil.

There's a lot of men and women in prison that could never cut it as slayers... shouldn't they have the same opportunity to roll the dice for a ticket out? Besides - they only need to survive one session.
VIDEO: the East Indian Female generi-con from the first battle gets smeared by a truck.
Right...
BULLET-CAM IMAGES of a SLAYERS SOLDIER leaping into actio and freezing in MID-AIR, a GRAPHIC SUPERIMPOSED:
THROW TO the LIVE STUDIO BROADCAST -
(leaning in) Mr. Castle - how the hell does it work?
Simple.

A 3-D ANIMATED GRAPHIC accompanies his explanation - the VIRTUAL CAMERA zooms in to the FROZEN SOLDIER'S head - an then INSIDE, passing thru transparent layers. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) It begins with a single nano-cell planted in the motor cortex of the brain -- this cell can replicate, replacing the cells `round it with perfect copies...

We see a cartoon image of a tiny nano-cell - labeled with bold, block letter N. The nano-cell approaches a normal c next to it... there is a flash; now the cell next to it h turned into an exact copy of the nano. This continues, multiplying exponentially, until we zoom back to reveal t the entire brain has been converted to nano-cells. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) ... these copied cells contain remote access functionality. Therefore, nano plus cortex equals the nanex.

The graphic zooms back further to show a pair of hands working a retro ATARI-style joystick... animated waves indicate a wireless transmission from the joystick to the Slayer, who unfreezes and flies into action.
Geek, geek, geek - come on, Castle, you promised us a demonstration.
CASTLE smiles broadly.
(coy) Did I? You know I seem to recall that - let's just see...

CASTLE waves in his PERSONAL SECURITY: A half dozen GEEKS in BLACK JEANS, BLACK T-SHIRTS w/ WHIT SOCKS and SNEAKERS; BACKPACKS... yes, even FANNY PACKS. A full range of GEEK VARIATIONS: beard/mustache combos, thi glasses, pony tails, etc. One GEEK brings out the CUTEST, SOFTEST little SPANIEL PU in the world and places it in CASTLE'S LAP. Meanwhile several OTHERS are directing HANDHELD SENSORS a GINA and thumb-clicking to establish TRACKING POINTS - he slightest movements are scanned and interpreted as data i real time.
(fighting it) Oh... my god. So cute.
You like her? Her name is Gina. She's a good little bitch.
Somehow, in his sweet southern drawl this rolls off almos acceptable. The CREW has a laugh off-screen; GINA blushes
I beg your pardon?
This motherfucker is off the charts.
You realize he could buy our network.
(shrugs) Why would he?
PRODUCER (cont'd) Son of a bitch can pull 650 million pay-per-views for a single broadcast.

ON the MONITORS: CASTLE is showing GINA how to make the dog roll over, sit etc. GINA has her hands up, limp in front of her chin, li a submissive puppy begging, and she is PANTING; she's cle getting into it... her every movement is MIRRORED by the adorable dog.
That's fuckin scary.
More COMBAT FOOTAGE, this time focusing on KABLE HIGHLIGH
Isn't it true that each human that undergoes the procedure will have a distinct IP address -- like a notebook computer or mobile device?
Similar, yep. But control is strictly localized to the parameters of our gaming environments.
KEN CASTLE (cont'd) You take Society for instance: once a cast member leaves the workplace they are completely free from the control and monitoring of their player.
(incredulous) That's a relief.
(teasing) To some, maybe... to some... don't you suspect a good many folks wouldn't mind an itty bit of control?
I don't... um...
Someone else making all the decisions for you... no responsibilities, no tough choices... think about it.
(tough) We will, Mr. Castle. We will.
A SUPERNOVA FLARE throws to MUSIC and GRAPHICS:
a LIVE
Back to handheld, non-broadcast REALITY. KEN has GINA's hand in his hand, beaming. Her demeanor ha changed; she's like a LITTLE GIRL with her DAD at the fai
Good little talk.
My pleasure. Shit, can I tell you? I CAN. NOT. wait for the next Slayers. Kable has been unbelievable. His arms are just so... well, I know it's awful.
What the hell is that?

The WORLDLINK GRAPHIC GLITCHES OUT, replaced by a BLUE SC - like an old school COMPUTER CRASH. THEN - One letter at a time, in retro Apple chicago font, accompanied by the exaggerated sound of COMPUTER KEYSTROK
Then a VOICE - deep, but speaking ARTIFICIALLY QUICKLY - in radio commercials, where they use time-compression software to remove the silences between the words.
Ken Castle wants you to believe that you are living in a safer, better world. He's a liar. Mind control is slavery. We will all be his dog if we allow this evolution to continue.
Everyone in the STUDIO is speechless, watching the monito including CASTLE; actually, he LOVES it... he's laughing ass off.
Mr. Castle, we have no idea...
Shush!
ON THE SCREEN, the humanz logo dissolves, 8-bit ARCADE ST replaced by: THE EVOLUTION OF MAN ACCORDING TO CASTLE

Underneath is the CLASSIC ILLUSTRATION showing the progression from primitive EARLY MAN to the erect MODERN HUMAN. In a crude ANIMATION the progression CONTINUES: MODERN MAN bends back over on his hands and knees; in the final stage he's wearing a DOG COLLAR, getting fucked in ass - then fed through a MEAT GRINDER, packaged & sold as HAMBURGER. KEN looks over at the PRODUCER. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) That's a God damn hoot.

(to his techies) Bypass orbital, reroute from the backup servers, NOW, for Christ sake, you dirty apes... (to CASTLE) Sorry, Mr. Castle, we can't hard- line a live broadcast. It's impossible to stop every virus that sneaks in.
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
KEN CASTLE

Uh huh. You might wanna oughta let my boys take a look at your firewall. The screen CUTS TO BLACK, COLOR-BARS blink, then an advertisement streams in. KEN stands, holding GINA'S hand, kisses it. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) (to GINA)
What about your firewall, sugar - wonder if I might breach it one of these sunny days. He gives her a ROGUISH WINK. GINA PARKER SMITH
You're bad.
He's good. On the monitors, we transition back into a paid commercia VICTORIA'S SECRET PORN-looking GIRL in HANDCUFFS turns to CAMERA. PORN GIRL
Wanna blow off a little steam?

A PRISONER - shirtless, his upper body smeared with WHITE POWDER, screaming, SLAMS HIS FIST DOWN INTO FACE. Blood sprays on white. We see that he is beating down a uniformed GUARD. The GUA wears a black gas mask, shattered and pouring blood. Othe prisoners, shackled together, stand by watching, forming half circle around the fight. They are shirtless, covered the same white powder - they look like tribesmen. One of the prisoners, very distinctive, nods grimly, clea enjoying the show. DISTINCTIVE PRISONER                            *
Fuck him up. The prison yard is a vast expanse of white - it could be chalk mine, or the surface of a strange planet. Distant towers mark the perimeter.
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007

Other groups of shackled prisoners can be seen in the distance, trotting along in lines. Trails of thick magent smoke snake across the yard, sucked by the wind. The ROGUE PRISONER stomps down on the GUARD'S face one la time - his shoes are made of cloth. CRUNCH. The GUARD sto moving. The PRISONER starts to run for it across the white terrai A group of GUARDS appear to round up the remaining prison They club them down with the butts of rifles but pay no m to the fleeing ROGUE... they merely watch him go, impassi In a moment, we see why - when the ROGUE PRISONER crosses between the two distant towers he is jerked to the ground an invisible field. Sound? Light? Magnetism? His body goes into spasms; blood foams from his ears, mouth, eyes.

Fingers run through white powder, making patterns. A black shadow crosses the frame, accompanied by a low hu some sort of aircraft. KABLE looks up as the shadow tracks across him; we never the craft. He looks out across the yard. KABLE is sitting in what seems to be a minimal REC AREA c out of the white terrain. He sits by himself wearing a wh cloth hoodie, eyes dark, head down, silent. Across the ya a group of prisoners are playing basketball; EVERY SINGLE PLAYER is SKYING for dunks. We focus in on KABLE'S TATTOO: I Am Right Here With You.. In the yard a CRIPPLE, his two legs stiff with braces, wa ROBOTICALLY along on crutches. KABLE watches him, expressionless. It triggers a memory...
A LITTLE GIRL, no more than two, walks along on her DADDY feet... giggling, trusting... her hands grip his big fingers... taking each big ROBOT STEP with him...
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
A BASKETBALL comes out of nowhere and KNOCKS THE CRUTCH O from under the CRIPPLE, sending him ass-up on the asphalt Prisoners JEER. FREEK (quiet, conspiratorial)

Kable. Kable. We see that KABLE has drawn the pattern in his tattoo wit his finger in the white powder; at the sound of the voice runs his hand through it, wiping it away. A wiry, jittery dude of indeterminate age is sitting next KABLE. KABLE doesn't even turn to look. KABLE
My name is Tillman, freak. FREEK

Tillmans, yeah, Tillmans, I knew that, they said you name's was Tillmans... just sittin, always sittin, always lookin, just lookin... like me, I keep my holes down... you got to, man... a dude inevitably start to break up, start to crack and break up everyday, never know you gonna die today or live another two, three. You never do know. All these niggaz gonna snap, snap, snap, one by one, every last one, all of em. Yeah but not you. Twenty seven battles and three to go... no one ever got that close before, no one even done ten games without gettin they brains shot... but Kable, Kable, Kable, he just sittin, lookin, like he got a plan, he already somewhere else, he on a mission, nothin' get in his way, never break, never snap, never say shit, just take care of his business, niggaz get spooked by that shit. You spooky. KABLE turns slowly to look him in the eye, says nothing. FREEK (cont'd)
Spooky. KABLE looks away.
FREEK (cont'd) Why they put you in here, Tillmans?
KABLE waits a good long beat.
I killed my best friend.
A prisoner sings Metallica off key, but balls to the wall
Master! Master! Master of Puppets I'm pulling your strings - Twisting your mind and smashing your dreams...

KABLE is alone in his cell. At the base of the single door is a SLIDING COMPARTMENT t push food through - it opens. But instead of a tray, some pushes through a wrinkled photograph. KABLE picks it up and looks - a WOMAN, just a blur of gol hair, laughing, and a LITTLE GIRL... the same one in KABL vision.
You want to get back to them.

KABLE is stunned, silent. He sits on the ground, shoulder leaning against the heavy door, staring at the girl in th picture. WOMAN (O.S.) (cont'd) It's all you think about. It's the only thing that keeps you alive.
Her words are like hammer blows to his guts; he wants to but he's too strong, too internalized. He steels himself.
Who's talking?
She pushes through a white NOTECARD and PEN.
Sign it.
What?
KABLE doesn't take it.
Sign it... please, Tillman. My son David is your biggest fan. He prays for you.

This takes KABLE by surprise; he reluctantly takes the pe and card. He writes something on it and sticks it back through the slider. PFFHHT. The WOMAN stabs KABLE'S hand with a LANCET - she draws out a little blood. KABLE yanks his hand back out. WOMAN (O.S.) (cont'd) Need to prove it's authentic. Makes it worth more.
Why would anyone want my name?
You don't even know what's going on out there, do you? (beat) Damn...
At the far end of the solitary block a BUZZER sounds - th the SLIDE and SLAM of heavy steel. WOMAN (O.S.) (cont'd) Gotta go.
KABLE jumps up and pulls himself against the door - a lifeline is slipping away...
Wait. (he holds the wrinkled photo to the window) How did you get this picture?            Have you seen them?

He peers through the little window at the top of the door but she's GONE... Instead, a group of PRISONERS are being led down the corr to their NEW CELLS. We recognize grim, battered faces fro the yard - these are the men that stood by as the GUARD w being beaten down.
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
DISTINCTIVE PRISONER - hands cuffed behind his back, make eye contact with KABLE as he walks by.

A desolate white RUNNING TRACK; a guard TOWER overlooks.. the field is empty but for ONE MAN: KABLE. He's busting ass around the track, pouring sweat. We're right there with him, CLOSE-UP - profile, full speed... w hear the HARD BREATHING, the feet pounding dirt, like we' INSIDE HIS HEAD.
WIDE LOCK OFF - KABLE, 90 feet high, a MURAL painted on t side of a BUILDING. It's an AD for SLAYERS: KABLE in FULL COMBAT MODE, cutting loose with a FLAME THROWER.
KABLE, running - we're even CLOSER NOW... he's pushing himself beyond exhaustion, pure focus...
Different city, same story - KABLE, a towering BILLBOARD PROJECTION... endless lanes of FREEWAY GRIDLOCK sprawling beneath...
KABLE, staggering, near collapse, lungs burning...
The ICONIC IMAGE of KABLE on the famous TIMES SQUARE VIDE WALL, now even more massive... the STOCK TICKERS reeling disaster... he's like GODZILLA frozen amongst the SKYSCRAPERS...

KABLE finally flames out... he breaks down to a jog, then doubles over, hands on his knees, gasping for breath. CUT OUT WIDE: KABLE is ant-size and insignificant on the long, barren field, under a vast grey sky... ALONE.
Hold for a long beat, and...

MONTAGE of GAMERS' FACES, preparing to GET IT ON... All shapes, colors and styles, but all RICH AND POWERFUL-look Some are sweating, some calm, some beat red, others have guitar-playing twitch faces...
SHOCK CUT into the HEAT OF BATTLE. CHAOS, CONFUSION... KABLE blasts through a cloud of explo debris... A BROWN to his left is BLOWN IN HALF - the LEGS KEEP RUNNING...
TED NUGENT, in BROWN camo, lines up a BLUE SNIPER in a 3r story window with a CROSS-BOW. He releases the arrow and pins the BLUE's HEAD to the window sill.
Damn, I gonna have to eat you now, son.
An UPSIDE-DOWN CAR comes SLIDING down the street on it's and slams into TED NUGENT, VAPORIZING him...

Another five BLUE SOLDIERS are taken out. Their bodies dr to the ground, gruesome goodness. The FIVE BALL BEARING CAMERAS quickly flock together and check out each body as swarming unit. From a wider shot, they look like flies on shit... after checking out the recently deleted, they zip towards the closest save point...
FIFTY beer slamming COLLEGE STUDENTS are going BERSERK... they've got SLAYERS on a wall-sized screen, pay-per-view. they're high fiving, SMASHING up the place...
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
KABLE LEAPS for a drainage trench, makes it, and hustles around the back of a burnt out building...
Up a stairway - the GHOST FACE on GLASS superimposed on t image - the face is LAUGHING, GIDDY... VOICE
Oh shit... oh shit...
KABLE takes up a spot from a second level vantage point - from here we see a small group of BLUES moving down the block, scanning for survivors. VOICE
Wul hello thar... KABLE watches himself SWITCH TURRETS on his WEAPON.   He brings up a SNIPER SIGHT and locks in on a target. VOICE (cont'd)

Wait for it... CLOSE-UP of KABLE'S EAR: just then he hears the SUBTLEST SOUNDS creeping up behind. Whoever's controlling him does seem to have noticed - he's too focused on the enemies in sights. We can see the tension in KABLE'S FACE - he's helpless, trying to fight it, willing his player to take notice. KABLE (whispering)
Turn me around God damn it... VOICE

What'd he say? A trickle of sweat runs down into KABLE'S EYE. The SOUND more distinct now, CLOSER... he's practically shaking fro the struggle to overcome the control. POV: someone has reached the top of the stairs... KABLE, from behind, comes into view crouched by the blown out window. VOICE (cont'd)
My boy gotta take a piss or something?
FINALLY: SNAP ZOOM on a reflection in a shard of HANGING WINDOW GLASS - the outline of a BLUE, raising his gun... VOICE (cont'd) D'oh.

KABLE SPINS - FAST. The TURRET is ALREADY REVOLVING when squeezes the trigger... The ARMOR-PIERCING SHELL takes SNEAKY BLUE by surprise, blowing him out the back of the building... The BLUES in the street take notice. It's a matter of seconds... KABLE makes a run for it as the floor starts to DISINTEGR behind him in a shitstorm of bullets. SHRAPNEL drills his back, absorbed by the BODY ARMOR.

He hits daylight and turns a corner in time to see a grou BROWNS scattering... a live ARTILLERY SHELL skitters acro the pavement, belching smoke. BOOM. KABLE is running... he looks to his right - A FROZEN MOME The SAVE POINT up ahead on the SPINNING RAILROAD. The MOMENT passes; KABLE looks back over his shoulder - a rush of ROARING FLAME is COMING - FAST... at the moment o IMPACT we -
SOLDIERS are charred, bleeding, wasted. A BROWN is sobbing uncontrollably.
Who are they... who the fuck are they... who's playing us?
KABLE watches him, wondering the same damn thing.
Two fat slices of WHOLE GRAIN BREAD, check.
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
Big sloppy spoonfuls of lumpy green ORGANIC PISTACHIO BUT spread on SLICE A, check. Welch's PURPLE GRAPE JELLY spread on SLICE B, check. Combine; CONSUME.

SIMON - 18, pale and lanky, unkempt shaggy hair; wearing vintage Guns `n' Roses T-shirt from the Appetite For Destruction Tour - walks down a long, high ceilinged crys hall with marble floors, macking on the sandwich... passe through a glass tunnel running through the interior of a massive, exotic aquarium - he's alone in what appears to vast, cold mansion.

SIMON'S ROOM is simple - FOUR WALLS and a CEILING, each o 3-D, corner-to-corner VIDEO SCREEN. The HD level of the screens is virtually ABSOLUTE - the flesh and blood SIMON himself is just another element in a HIGH-DOLLAR/HIGH-TEC SPACE. The FLOOR is ALL BED. SIMON PADS IN, takes a spinning STU JUMP and ROLLS onto his back in a big ass pile of pillows sandwich intact. The SCREENS are a jumble of floating frames, competing fo prominence in the 3-D space... muted VID CHATS, STOCK TICKERS, SPORTS SCORES, ultraviolent SLAYERS playback, et Everything dynamic, everything moving. One whole wall is apparently a REAL TIME monitor of the SLAYERS BATTLEGROUND, with updated statistics... POINTS LEADER, FRAG COUNT - we notice that KABLE leads these categories; a video loop of KABLE in action beside his na illustrates the point. In the FOREFRONT of SIMON'S attention: KABLE EARNS 800 UPGRADE POINTS

A set of dynamic frames allow him to scroll through a ser of revolving images - WEAPONS, EQUIPMENT, BODY ARMOR. SIMON interacts with the 3-D environment using HAND GESTU he can SLIDE, SQUEEZE, PULL AND SCROLL the images just by moving his fingers in the air. He flips past various TRANSFORMERS-looking SUPER GUNS...
Gay... gay... gay... super gay... hm.
He stops on an animated graphic. A SEXY FEMALE VOICE brea it all down for us:
Swarmers. The latest innovation from Browning, this self detonating cartridge offers the widest and deadliest spray available from a full tracking, cornering ordnance.
A VIDEO DEMO shows the fired cartridge SPLIT into two-doz smaller shells that FLASH OUT like a swarm of bees, wind around a corner and utterly SHRED a TEST DUMMY.
Daddy like...
An ANNOYING GIRL'S VOICE pops in, along with a VID CHAT SCREEN that takes over the MAIN WALL. She looks about 16 skinny, skanky, kind of hot.
Simon!
Fan-girl, stop hacking. If I want you unmuted I'll unmute you.
You suck, Simon - you're going to get my boyfriend killed before he can get out of jail and fill me up with his hot seed.
Uh huh.
Another GIRL - 17, cute, stoned - chimes in.
Simon, I just wanna play you. Forget about that star-fucker.
Shut up bitch.
SIMON casually waves his hand at the frame, like flicking a fly; ANNOYING GIRL is wiped away, bringing CUTE STONED to the forefront.
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
CUTE STONED GIRL
Thanks baby. When can I meet you for like reals? SIMON notices a metallic sparkle from the GIRL'S TONGUE. SIMON
What is that? (like a dentist)

Aaaa. He reaches out and "pinches" the screen, ZOOMING IN close she sticks out her tongue - it fills the wall... a dozen wicked looking BLACK TONGUE RINGS stud the wet pink flesh TEN FEET HIGH. SIMON (cont'd)
Woah. He quickly unsqueezes, zooming back out. The GIRL'S eyes rolled back in her head, euphoric; she's WASTED. CUTE STONED GIRL
You like me? A THIRD GIRL pops in, filling the opposite wall. SHELLY
What's up, loser?
Hey sissy. This is SIMON'S SISTER, SHELLY, 14.       Frosted up lips and hair like a Tokyo hooker. SHELLY
Mom says - let me see, go to college, move the fuck out, and... oh yeah, you're a sick retard, you're pathetic, and you smell like Jeffrey Dahmer. SIMON
Wanna make out? SHELLY
You wish. I can't wait til they cut you off, Simian. With a wave of his hand he wipes her image off the screen TWO MORE video chats pop up - TWIN 21-YEAR OLD GIRLS, stupidly hot.
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
Simon?
Maybe. TWINS (star struck)
Oh my god, it's really you!!! Suddenly all of SIMON's screens are filled with the TWINS
Nice. TWINS (in unison)
Do you wanna see our tits, Simon? SIMON (shrugs)
Uh, sure. They lift their shirts, GIRLS GONE WILD style.      Perfe C's with silver-dollar nipples. TWIN 1
Mmmmm, now that we have your attention, here's another offer you can't refuse. SIMON
Here we go. When TWIN 2 speaks, it is with a MAN'S VOICE. The accent EASTERN EUROPEAN. TWIN 2
Fifty million euros for control of Kable, instant transfer to the account of your choice. SIMON
Question: do I look like I need the money? We've discussed this before - Kable is not for sale. TWIN 1 (feeling herself up)
Baby... make it a hundred. SIMON
It's been real.

SIMON snaps his fingers; all the windows close simultaneously. SIMON makes a clicking sound with his tongue in the new silence. Peace at last. BY THEMSELVES, the screens come BACK TO LIFE. SIMON (cont'd)
D'oh. The instant chat boxes are gone, replaced by a soundless, GRAINY VIDEO LOOP - there is something sinister about the fi image... it looks like the feed from an old SURVEILLAN
Two men are sitting in a room... it's silent, but one of seems to be SCREAMING - he lifts a gun... SIMON (cont'd)

What the fuh...? ... waits a beat... and SHOOTS THE OTHER MAN IN THE HEAD. Black blood pools. This is REAL. The loop repeats. When the SHOOTER turns his face toward the camera, SIMON freezes the frame with a gesture and ZOOMS IN. It's KABLE. A MESSAGE is typed across the screen one letter at a time we may recognize the retro chicago font from the HUMANZ v prank earlier: want to talk to him?
Then, blinking, lo-fi in the lower right corner of the wa WALKIETALKIE.exe SIMON (cont'd)
Um.

MUSIC: Bloodhound Gang, The Bad Touch: Ha-ha, well now, we call this the act of mating But there are several other very important differences Between human beings and animals That you should know about...
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007

You and me baby ain't nothin' but mammals So let's do it like they do on the Discovery Channel... PAVEMENT flies by... sun SLAMS rainbow flares into the lens... ROLLER SKATES break frame, outpacing us... We're cruising along with a group of YOUNG, BEAUTIFUL PEO skating like ROBOTS through a CITY PARK... Roller-Dolly follows HOT GIRLS in DAISY DUKES, knee socks and tube top belly rings and tatoos in the small of their backs... ATHLETIC DUDES, shirtless, gun racks and six packs... They SWING THEIR ARMS mechanically, identically... synced with each other and the beat of the soundtrack... each fa plastered with an absurd, exaggerated GRIN... let's FUCKI

We are in a super-saturated world... NOT virtual/animated but absolutely real - yet the color and immediacy of it i heightened, off-kilter. On the GRASS, a gang of TOKYO POP PUNK ROCKERS are having WATER BATTLE, blasting and soaking each other with big plastic WATER CANNONS like something out of SLAYERS... A REDHEAD, soaking wet, is FEELING UP HER OWN BREASTS, totally OBLIVIOUS to her surroundings... One of the SKATE out of control, PLOWS RIGHT INTO HER at full speed... The SKATER takes a ride on concrete, grinding flesh off her b legs... she wobbles to her feet, EYES STREAMING TEARS but STILL GRINNING ecstatically... A guy in a PRIEST OUTFIT holding brightly colored helium balloons looks on impassively; then spots something of interest and breaks off SPRINTING FULL SPEED... People are DANCING - the corniest moves ever... MAKING OU the ground... and in the middle of it all...

CLOSE-UP: a SPARROW is pecking at a hunk of orange and ye CANDY CORN. POP OUT WIDE to reveal that the BIRD is EATING OUT OF A GIRL'S HAND... This is ANGIE: 25, BLONDE/black roots... micro mini skirt fishnets, boots... green-eyes, haunted, with sadness behi them; pretty - the clothes don't quite match her; it's li someone dressed her up as a hooker.... She doesn't seem t notice the little bird munching away; she stands in the middle of the PARK, looking around, lost.

She spots a GUY standing by himself near a giant sculptur She walks over to him; the BIRD flutters away. The GUY is young and attractive, dressed in casual busine attire. He is wearing a PLASTIC PIG SNOUT on his face, ti with an elastic band.
Hey.
He smiles like a Driver's License photo.
CLOSE-UP of LIPS, profile - by the looks of it, an OVERWE MALE... sweat, stubble. The ROOM is DARK - lit by the AMBIENT GLOW of a VIDEO SCREEN.
Hi.
ANGIE echoes, practically overlapping.
Hi.
We will continue to CUT between the two locations.
So what's your damage?
He WINKS. ANGIE strikes an exaggeratedly DEMURE, FLIRTATIOUS POSE - then immediately snaps back to NEUTRALITY.
You know, just hanging out. (beat) Looking to meet people.
Lucky you...
A CLOSE-UP of LIPS to match GORGE'S, but facing the OPPOS DIRECTION. An extremely butch, masculine FEMALE; trace of mustache. DALE
You met me.
GUY (echoing)
You met me. ANGIE laughs, a beat LATE. Across the street a WOMAN has hiked up her skirt, squatted down and is TAKING A PEE on sidewalk.
I'm Nika. DALE/GUY
I'm Dale. (looks her up and down)
I like your fur. GORGE/ANGIE
Do you want to go somewhere? She strikes the same FLIRTY POSE for the second time. DALE/GUY

We are somewhere. He WINKS; reaches out and puts a hand on her WAIST. They start to make out like TEENAGERS at the PROM. DALE/GUY LI UP HER SKIRT with one hand and SQUEEZES A BOOB with the other. He turns her around and presses ANGIE'S back up against t base of the sculpture, ROUGH, hands all over her/inside h SLOBBERING down her neck and shoulders... ANGIE just looks straight ahead... her EYES move to a nea building - the side is an ANIMATED BILLBOARD that has switched to a promo for SLAYERS, with KABLE featured prominently. She watches KABLE'S face move... she lets out an involunt MOAN that is more like a whimper... DALE/GUY (cont'd)
Thanks for vagina.

head_text.subj: A SLAM OF AUDIO WITH THE SHOCK IMAGE OF A BLOODY, DEMONIC

text: (recreating an internet-style video SHOCK PRANK) ... the SCREEN GOES DEAD - ... and another BLUE SCREEN OF DEATH, another MESSAGE: SOCIETY is RAPE SLAYERS is MuRder - humanz

We get our first wider view of the room. Much more crampe than SIMON'S ROOM... like SIMON'S, the room is dominated GIANT VIDEO SCREEN, but just the front wall... there are other - smaller, paper thin - screens mounted in various spots and leaning against walls; GARBAGE and TECH GEAR al over the floor. GORGE - late 30s, MORBIDLY OBESE - is contained by a mass automated rolling chair, like the Escalade of Rascals. The HUMANZ message has taken over his screen and he's GOI FUCKING BALLISTIC, throwing shit at it and gesturing craz to the wall-mounted MOTION SENSORS with his hands, trying get the image back. It's NOT HAPPENING.
... a new video prank by the subversive group humanz caused a nationwide stir today...

The TV REPORT continues on screen, where a NEWS HOST is backed by a graphic showing the "society is rape" screen footage of exaggeratedly CONFUSED, FRUSTRATED PLAYERS - they're like the actors in INFOMERCIALS who can't manage peel a potato without losing their shit.
All contact between Society City and an estimated quarter of a million players was shut down for over three hours while Castle techs worked to remove what they described as a "Satellite Infection"...
A TREE LINED, SUN DAPPLED MOUNTAINSIDE whisks by as feet the pedals of a MOUNTAIN-BIKE; we're moving around 20 mph

CASTLE is cruising downhill in a 360 degree THREE-DIMENSI ENVIRONMENT that looks ABSOLUTELY REAL - except that he i a STATIONARY BIKE, and the NEWS REPORT is floating in the as a 3D WINDOW. He is wearing skintight Tour de France-st gear and SLURPING A SMOOTHIE, one hand on the handlebar, other holding the cup. FEMALE   NEWS HOST (cont'd) Experts estimate   that the service interruption may   end up costing K- Soft billions in   lost revenue.
Don't cry for Castle, he can cover that with the change under his couch cushions...
On a personal note - that shit was fucking freaky.
Oh - I literally pissed myself.
Sounds like fun.
Serious, these humanz cocksuckers are getting out of control, and someone should do something.
Moving on to international headlines...
CASTLE closes the WINDOW in his FIST. SLUUURRRRRRP.
The SCREAM would be comical if it weren't so HORRIFIC. With a dozen CONS looking on: an ASIAN PRISONER is on his knees, FINGERS DEEP into the back of his own skull.
GET IT OUT OF ME...!

He rips into his BRAIN STEM with a tiny piece of busted RAZOR, hoping to pull out a chip, a wire, anything. He pu out something, and drops like a sack of potatoes to the f - FRIED POTATOES. He lands on a couple of dumbbells, his head smashing into the weight bench, spinal cord SEVERED. KABLE looks on, impassive, emotion internalized.       GU through.
What the hell happened to this one?
An old black dude - LIFER - answers.
Look like he escaped.
The GUARDS roll their eyes; drag away the body.
Back to your Jazzercise, girls...

Across the room KABLE notices a NEW GUY - a mean-looking sunofabitch... in fact, if murder were personified it wou look exactly like HACKMAN. HACKMAN stares straight at KABLE. There is something in h ghost of a smile that says he'd be more than happy to eviscerate you... it's off-putting to say the least.
Freak.
FREEK is there.
Tillmans.
Who the hell is that?

New dude, new dude... that's Hackman. They say he killed a whole mess of people, all kind of people... one day he just walk up and turn himself in, like he wanna be inside or some shit... never gonna run out of slayers long as they got that kind of motherfucka run around kill a mess of people...
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
Now HACKMAN is looking at KABLE dead blank. A GUARD comes behind HACKMAN and SHOVES HIM. HACKMAN turns; the GUARD gestures him to follow.
Hey Kable. KABLE turns to look. HISPANIC GUARD (cont'd)
Let's go. Upgrades.

KABLE and the GUARD are ANT-SIZED in what looks like a massive driving range. VIRTUAL TARGETS are holographicall projected in mid-air at various heights and distances. Ot PRISONERS are there too, a ways off; well out of earshot. KABLE looks over a Swarmer cartridge, slams it into his weapon; switches turrets, takes a bead on a VIRTUAL TARGE We see him intentionally PAN THE SIGHT OFF to the left of target; he pulls the trigger - CLICK. The TARGET - and several others close by - turns RED, BLINKS - a HIT. This thing doesn't just take out individuals; it takes out VICINITIES.
Who aims? KABLE (caught off guard)
What? HISPANIC GUARD
Who aims... the slayer? Or the player? KABLE narrows his eyes, focuses across the field, where o PRISONERS are being briefed and UPGRADED... he spots HACK KABLE
Not much to aiming... it's just hand/eye coordination. I'm the hand... someone, somewhere else is the eye. HISPANIC GUARD
That's tripped.
KABLE glances at the GUARD... he struggles - part of him feels like he's talking too much; but he can't help being grateful for the human interaction.
Sometimes... they take over - you know, completely. They move you. Like a robot. (beat) But it doesn't work so good... that part's just for show. You can't really fight that way.
Why?
There's a delay...
Yeah, the ping... they talk about that. The time it takes the slayer to respond to the command... it's like, five millisecond ping, eight millisecond ping...
KABLE gets a bead for a headshot on HACKMAN.
Whatever you call it. A slice of a second is the difference between living and dying out there. When the trigger pulls -
He pulls the trigger: a meaty CLICK. KABLE (cont'd) It's just me.

KABLE is ALONE, toweling off - privilege of being a TOP SLAYER. We see now   the DAMAGE his body has taken - he is covere dark, ugly   BRUISES from BULLET HITS the body armor has absorbed -   including a flinch-inducing cluster of BLACK AND YELLOW   from the most recent session. From down the row of lockers, a WHISPER:
Hey. Kable.
KABLE turns to look. HACKMAN'S head is POKED OUT sideways from around the corner; he's maybe 20 feet away.
Not interested.
No. Wait. Look.
He brings his HANDS out where KABLE can see them - they a SLICK WITH FRESH BLOOD. HACKMAN (CONT'D) (cont'd) I just deleted someone.
HACKMAN is almost GIGGLING, high on it. HACKMAN (CONT'D) (cont'd) This is the blood. Look.

HACKMAN rubs his SLIPPERY HANDS together, relishing it; h nods his head toward the area behind the lockers... to ca the situation CREEPY would be a serious understatement. HACKMAN (cont'd) He's back here. Want to see?
Your head ain't on straight.
HACKMAN cracks his neck. Maybe not. KABLE pulls on his PRISON GREYS quickly, refusing to make EYE CONTACT.
I'm going to delete you too. On Sunday.
Yeah, probably.
That's why they put me here.

KABLE'S eyes narrow - What? HACKMAN disappears; he starts to move along an ADJACENT R OF LOCKERS, slamming the doors - SINGING fucking PINOCCHI HACKMAN (cont'd) I've got no strings... So I have fun... I'm not tied up to anyone... They've got strings But you can see There are no strings on me...
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
KABLE tenses up, ready for INSTANT VIOLENCE. HACKMAN (cont'd)
You got two whores, Kable... If he didn't have KABLE'S attention before, THIS GOT IT.
- the fuck did you say?

On the outside... oh, I'm sorry - I meant your pretty girls... You want to get back to them but I'm going to visit them first... KABLE is instantly ALL BUSINESS - he's going to make HACK disappear RIGHT THE FUCK NOW... He JAMS around the corner but HACKMAN is NOWHERE TO BE SEEN... past another row of lockers - NOTHING... another. another... WHERE THE HELL IS HE? NOWHERE. KABLE SLAMS a FIST into a locker, BUSTING it off it's hin
The CAMERA ANGLE on HACKMAN begins to switch perspectives spin around, as though someone is manipulating it in thre dimensions.

He's so perfect. Snap out to reveal CASTLE in a dark lounge; the walls and ceiling are pure black, making it impossible to tell the dimensions of the room. Minimalist, expensive looking furniture is scattered around. THERE'S NO ONE ELSE IN THE ROOM. CASTLE is standing, bare feet on white shag carpet. He is manipulating the image of HACKMAN in the air by pulling, squeezing, twisting with his hands - the interface is sim to the one in SIMON'S room. CASTLE is as pumped as a kid on Christmas morning. Then, behind him:
He's scary.
We see that a perfect double of CASTLE himself has appear in the room behind him.
Yeah...

He changes the angle on HACKMAN'S mug to give a better vi then turns to face his DOUBLE... CASTLE (cont'd) (proudly) The new face of Slayers. Pure crystallized horror, two stories tall and covered in bloody red... (beat) He's so what they want.
(playing dumb) But they love Kable.
Another CASTLE appears to CASTLE'S left.
He's right.
CASTLE faces them.

(unaffected) They do now. But when my boy kills their hero right there in front of their eyeballs, so vivid it's like you can reach out and feel the wet flesh - Trust me, they'll change their point of view.
How can you be sure?
It's human nature. They'll be seduced by the power, the violence... the dominance...
(shaking his head) Guess we never figured on Kable blowing up as big as he did.
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
CASTLE
Bigger than the game? No. Then again, who ever would've imagined a player could last over a dozen sessions with the same I-con... CASTLE 2
Tillman is a perfect soldier, a tactical killing computer - you dropped him in with common murderers. What did you expect? CASTLE 3 (musing)
His instincts give him an edge. CASTLE 2
And in the hands of a talented player... CASTLE 3
Of course we can never let him out. Not after what we did to him. CASTLE 2
Tell me again why we don't just get rid of the problem... (makes a throat slashing motion)
You know, off camera? CASTLE pokes a finger at CASTLE 2. CASTLE
YOU - lack a flair for marketing. The people would never accept that. They need to SEE their gladiators brought down. CASTLE 3

One thing I know is what makes people tick. Suddenly the room has gone dead silent. We swing the came around to reveal that CASTLE 3 is all alone in the room. stares into the void, calm and utterly in control. The CAMERA moves past his head into PURE BLACK...
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
The black of the underground tunnel... the TUNNEL LIGHTS streak past like vanishing stars... TRAIN TRACKS blur by.
KABLE is SPRINTING down the TUNNEL towards DAYLIGHT. VOICE comes from the rear surrounds: VOICE (O.S.)
Kable, dude. It's me. KABLE shakes his head, thinking he's HEARING THINGS.
Who?
Simon. (beat)
I'm playing you, dummy. KABLE knifes through the tunnel EXIT...

We are in the OVER-THE-SHOULDER POV of the FLY CAM as KAB breaks daylight and slides down the hillside... superimpo over the IMAGE: SIMON'S REFLECTED FACE... the CAMERA pans centers and FOCUSES IN on the REFLECTION... SNIPER BULLETS whistle by; KABLE DUCKS, ROLLS... the CAME PULLS BACK... OUT OF THE SCREEN...

... past the flesh and blood SIMON into an OVER-THE-SHOUL SIMON controlling KABLE, PLAYING HIM - as... KABLE LANDS in the ROCKSTAR POSE. SIMON mirrors him in fr of the GIANT SCREEN - whatever SIMON does, KABLE echoes.
KABLE makes it to cover, HEART SLAMMING.           We hea THUMPS of MORTARS LAUNCHING. KABLE
How come I can hear you? SIMON (O.S.)
It's a mod.
Gamers can't talk to cons.
I know.
SIMON POP-LOCKS - the breakdance arm wave.
It's cool, yeah?
KABLE finishes the POP-LOCK - it's goofy. A SHELL impacts the dirt nearby and BLOWS A MASSIVE CRATE the firma; KABLE shields himself from the raining DEBRIS scrambles for better cover.
No. Pay attention to the game.

They spot another BROWN advancing toward a group of BUILDINGS; SIMON moves KABLE to join him. Just as KABLE g there a BLUE KICKS OUT A DOOR and opens up with an ASSAUL SHOTGUN, shredding the BROWN. Two more BLUES POP OUT of a DITCH on the OPPOSITE SIDE, TRIANGULATING. KABLE ROLLS - BIG AMMO displacing the air just inches abo his head and BLOWING OUT the windows/tires of an ABANDONE CAR behind him - switches TURRETS and comes up FIRING... armor-piercing shells: BOOM. KABLE wants to EXPLODE - but he contains himself. He's playing CASTLE'S GAME, and the RULES are still UNDEFINED. Then - MUSIC: The SOUND of a SWINGIN' HI-HAT from down a corridor - t - t - tssss, t - t - tssss, t - t - tsss... KABLE walks toward the source; a bass and piano pick up t groove.

He comes to a BALLROOM - empty, like everything else; shi hardwood floor for DANCING. A SPOTLIGHT pops on from above, illuminating KEN CASTLE. He's wearing a T-SHIRT and JEANS. Every instinct tells KA to go after him - but he holds back. Who knows if it's ev real? And then CASTLE starts to SING... ... or more precisely, LIP SYNC - the VOICE is SINATRA, I Got You Under My Skin... CASTLE is doing a spot-on KARAOK I've got you under my skin
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007

I've got you deep in the heart of me So deep in my heart, that you're really a part of me I've got you under my skin... He's snapping his fingers, putting on the moves... THEN - from behind curtains - a half dozen SLAYERS appear. We RECOGNIZE THE SCARRED, BATTLE-TOUGH FACES from the prison the game, the pursuit... only instead of BLUE, they are wearing TUXEDOES with BLUE BOW-TIES. KABLE grips his weapon, but the men are UNARMED; instead, they fall in on the beat and go into a CHOREOGRAPHED DANC behind CASTLE... I'd sacrifice anything come what might For the sake of having you near In spite of a warning voice that comes in the night And repeats, and repeats in my ear... KABLE notices SHADOWY FIGURES around the perimeter of the room... glasses, beards, pony tails - silently, the GEEK SQUAD has moved in and taken position. They move their ha in rhythm, synchronized... each one seems to control a DANCER: they TWIRL A FINGER and the SLAYER SPINS... kick with TWO FINGERS FOR LEGS and the SLAYER KICKS like a ROCKETTE. Suddenly, ON A MUSICAL HIT, everyone - CASTLE, the GEEKS, SLAYERS - points dramatically up at the wall, where a VID SCREEN BEGINS TO PLAY: it is footage of the GEEK SQUAD busting into humanz headquarters and EFFICIENTLY KILLING EVERYONE. ANGIE is tasered unconscious and dragged away. Don't you know, little fool, you never can win? Use your mentality, wake up to reality... But each time I do just the thought of you makes me STOP before I give in Cause I've got you, under my skin... KABLE hits his breaking point. He brings up his WEAPON to open up on the SLAYERS... CLICK. It's DEAD. The GEEKS hav taken care of that. KABLE tosses it aside and sprints for CASTLE, but the SLA break off from the choreography to ENGAGE HIM; turns out they're flesh and blood after all. CASTLE backs away, whistling the melody, and continues hi SOFTSHOE to the music as KABLE wades into brutal hand-to- combat... breaking necks, snapping arms, smashing faces.. it's a full-on BALLET OF DEATH... finally, THE MUSIC ENDS right on cue: KABLE is finishing off the last of the men, blood on his hands.
CASTLE applauds; the GEEKS follow suit.
(genuinely stoked)
You're awesome.
Castle.
Kable. They speak simultaneously: KABLE                               KEN CASTLE
I don't care about you.               You don't care abou KEN CASTLE (cont'd)

... you just want your little sugar pie, I know. So don't do anything stupido. My house, my rules. CASTLE walks away, leaving his back open to KABLE seeming without concern, toward a side door. KEN CASTLE (cont'd)
Come on, I want to show you something.
Tracking along the hallway, MEDIUM CLOSE, profile: CASTLE walks along, confidently, KABLE following. The background is a black, glittering STARSCAPE.

I've got to thank you for leading me to them, by the by - the human- zuzz that is... Snap out WIDE: the hallway seems to run along the SURFACE THE MOON - another 3-D projection, no doubt. CRATERS and LUNAR DEBRIS stretch to the horizon. The GEEK SQUAD walks along behind CASTLE and KABLE at a distance... they are a tiny MOON ANTS in the vast lunar panorama... the PLANET E rising majestically in the dark heavens. KEN CASTLE (cont'd)
Of course, soon enough they'd be whistling my tune like everybody else... but meantime it was that little cracker program they dreamed up that got my attention...
KEN CASTLE (cont'd) that was a genuine nuisance, no doubt about it... One thing even they didn't know, though: I'm wired too.
SNAP back to CASTLE, MEDIUM       CLOSE.     His eyes are CRAZY. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) I replaced 98% of my own noodle with nano-tissue years ago...

They leave the hallway and step on to an indoor, NBA regulation BASKETBALL COURT; electronic scoreboard, bleachers, the whole nine. It's dark, moody - only one ba of OVERHEAD FLOODS is turned on. At the FAR END of the COURT, HACKMAN is in WARM-UPS, shoo baskets. ONE leg - the one with the ABBREVIATED TOES - is a FLEX BRACE. The GEEK SQUAD grabs seats in the BLEACHERS.

But mine's different. (taps his FOREHEAD) Built to send - to transmit . Whereas every other K-soft cell out there - including the ones in... (taps KABLE'S forehead ) your head, Kable - is designed to receive. I think it, you do it.

CASTLE looks across the court at HACKMAN; nods toward him HACKMAN drops the ball and begins to POP LOCK. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) We're talking every Slayer, everyone in Society City... I believe your better half would fall under that category... provided they're within range of my transmitters...
CASTLE chuckles at HACKMAN; HACKMAN stops dancing, jogs o picks up the ball and resumes shooting.
(sarcastic) Very nice, Castle. So you've got an army of psychotics and deviants to dance around for you.
CASTLE narrows his eyes, amusement edging out irritation; walks over to a bin of GRIP POWDER.
You're thinking small, Kable. But not as small as me.

He sinks his hands into the POWDER, brings them out and CLAPS, making WHITE DUST CLOUDS. KABLE waves the dust AWA FROM HIS FACE. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) See, nano cells are real small, a thousand times smaller than even these dust particulates... (KABLE coughs) Inhale it and they go to work: replicating, spreading... like a virus, multiplying in exponentials... six months time I could have 100 million people converted - ditch diggers, porn stars, presidents - and not one would be the wiser.

Behind KABLE, HACKMAN lets the ball roll away and silentl TURNS TOWARD US. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) A hundred million folks that will buy what I want them to buy, vote how I want them to vote, do pretty much damn well anything I figure they ought to do.
HACKMAN comes running at KABLE from behind, eyes burning, a full charge... running into FOCUS... holding the BOWIE KNIFE... KEN CASTLE(cont'd) For instance.

KABLE hears HACKMAN at the last second, spins and ABSORBS TACKLE. The men GO TO THE GROUND, grappling, UFC-style. KABLE has HACKMAN'S KNIFE HAND by the wrist, stopping it but leaving his face UNPROTECTED... HACKMAN brings his free ELBOW down on KABLE'S face, connecting and opening a CUT under his eye; then AGAIN - time KABLE catches the elbow with his own free hand and WRENCHES IT IN SIDEWAYS, dislocating HACKMAN'S shoulder w a sickening POP.
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007

KABLE works around HACKMAN, gets him in a HEADLOCK and SQUEEZES... still gripping the knife hand, immobilizing i HACKMAN is choking, BEAT RED... for long, brutal seconds life drains out of him... finally, HACKMAN'S eyes roll ba he GOES LIMP. KABLE takes the BOWIE KNIFE from HACKMAN'S dead fingers. He struggles to his feet, dripping sweat and blood.
You should've let him fight for himself, Castle - he might've had a shot.
(pleasant)
I think you're missing the point, my man.
No, I get it - you're pulling the strings on all of this... (starts to move toward CASTLE with BAD INTENT)

... which makes my next move pretty easy to figure. KABLE comes at CASTLE FAST, bringing the KNIFE around to his throat like a PEZ DISPENSER... His arm FREEZES IN MID AIR, the BLADE inches from contact

Neglected to mention: my smart boys reversed that hack those fellas worked for you - easy breezy, once we had access to their drives... This is gut-wrenching for KABLE -- after tasting freedom, feels his will ripped away from him... HE'S BEING PUPPETE THE MAN HE HATES THE MOST. KEN CASTLE (cont'd)
You're mine, boy. With a twitch of CASTLE'S eyes KABLE brings the KNIFE dow and SLICES OPEN HIS OWN LEG.
SIMON is sitting on the floor, head hung low, in front of dead wall... a glitch, a flicker... the screen comes to l
It's KABLE'S POV of KEN CASTLE.          CASTLE is stripp shirt.
(on SCREEN) Come on, lets boogie woogie rock and roll.
Ummm.
CASTLE throws a funky KARATE KICK and nails KABLE in the jaw... then a haymaker to the GUT, doubling KABLE over. He lets KABLE swing the KNIFE just short of his face as h backs away.
Biggest, baddest Slayer in the game... don't seem like much, does he?
CASTLE is enjoying the hell out of himself. He uppercuts KABLE, snapping his head back... then shakes out his knuckles. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) Oww!

KABLE swings his OPEN HAND around - CASTLE choreographs i perfectly: KABLE'S nails rake across CASTLE'S STOMACH, MARKING HIM UP like BRUCE LEE in Enter The Dragon. CASTLE strikes a pose to match. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) Lucky shot. (grins) OK, not really.
He brings a passable REVERSE CRESCENT KICK that drops KAB to the floor. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) I need an audience, boys.

A DOOR OPENS at the far end of the court; KABLE looks up slowly, afraid of what he knows he'll see: ANGIE and DELIA are led into the room. ANGIE presses hers close to DELIA, holding her shoulders protectively.

She keeps her distance from the GEEK SQUAD escorts and tr to block DELIA from them - there is raw fear and anger in eyes; the GEEK SQUAD are not overtly violent or menacing, ANGIE seems acutely aware that they are lethal. DELIA see oddly neutral and unaffected by the entire situation. CASTLE kicks KABLE across the floor, toward them. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) That's right, you crawl on your belly like a toad... (he looks to the GEEK SQUAD, sheepish) Is this bad? I'm really bad.

He gives KABLE a last kick; KABLE collapses in front of h DAUGHTER... she looks down at him, curiously. He looks up at DELIA, eyes soaked with emotion... then to ANGIE. They share a moment of intense eye contact - we fe that ANGIE wants desperately to go to him but is unsure o what is the best action to take strategically; she is loo to KABLE for a clue. KABLE'S eyes go back to DELIA; he tries to reach up and gently touch her face... KEN CASTLE (cont'd) That's sweet.
CASTLE steps on KABLE'S hand, pinning it to the floor. KEN CASTLE (cont'd) Alright boys, you ready? A true test.

He steels his eyes on KABLE and concentrates. KABLE slowly brings up the KNIFE toward DELIA'S THROAT. ANGIE moves to pull DELIA away - CASTLE merely glances up her and she FREEZES, paralyzed. We can see her body strai against invisible control, raw panic in her eyes...
(desperate) No.
Just like last time. Remember?
KABLE is FIGHTING IT with all his will, his whole body shaking...
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
KEN CASTLE (cont'd) You're stronger now... a little more fight in you... but I think the end result will be about the same... KEN CASTLE (cont'd) Shh.

The GEEKS look on, impassive. The BLADE is inches away... looks into ANGIE'S eyes - she and KABLE are like one; he seems to draw strength from her... finally, KABLE WILLS EVERYTHING HE HAS and STABS THE KNIFE INTO THE FLOORBOARD Suddenly: KABLE's head SNAPS around, his eyes confused... and in on quick, smooth movement, KABLE YANKS THE KNIFE out of the floor, RISES TO HIS FEET AND SPINS ON CASTLE. He claps a hand around CASTLE'S neck and tries to jam the knife up i his GUT - but CASTLE is able to FREEZE HIM just short... KEN CASTLE (cont'd) (freaked) What the hell was that?
The GEEKS break out tiny devices and start quickly scanni Not even KABLE understands this.
There are 2 networks accessing the same IP address.
Someone on the outside is sending him commands...

SIMON is on his feet, in full BADASS GAMER MODE. His body is positioned exactly like KABLE'S - right hand gripping the virtual blade for an underhand thrust; left clutching CASTLE'S THROAT... he FORCES HIS RIGHT HAND FORWARD...
WHITE KABLE SCRIPT - 9/19/2007
... KABLE'S KNIFE HAND begins to inch forward. Now CASTLE the one struggling for control; he claws weakly at KABLE' hand, trying to loosen it off his neck...
(panicking)

head_text.subj: JAM THE SIGNAL YOU GOD DAMN

text: (irritated)
Working on it... KABLE'S eyes are locked in on CASTLE'S... straining with everything he has... his strength and will overpowering CASTLE, but-
(like he's explaining the obvious to a child)
I think it. KABLE, succumbing to CASTLE'S control, begins to move the knife away from CASTLE'S belly. KEN CASTLE (cont'd)

You... fucking... do it... CASTLE delivers a CRUNCHING HEADBUTT to his NOSE, KABLE l his footing, sweat pouring down his face, bloody, drained CASTLE pushes the KNIFE back towards KABLE. He fights bac every muscle in his arm fighting against another like Yin Yang, veins rising in his neck... Then KABLE senses an opportunity:

Look at this knife... imagine me sticking it into your gut... think about it... make it real. CASTLE laughs... BUT HIS EYES FLICKER TO THE KNIFE - of course he can't help but picture it... ... and in that instant KABLE JAMS IN THE BLADE...
(blank)
Oops.

... CASTLE focuses, trying to pull it back out, but KABLE shoves it in deeper - CASTLE'S EYES BULGE. Finally KABLE TWISTS the KNIFE and lifts CASTLE OFF THE GROUND. The paralysis breaks from ANGIE - she lunges forward to t her arms around her daughter.
(triumphant) YES!!!
He drops down into the badass, ROCKSTAR pose...
... and KABLE does the same.
Damn it, kid...
CASTLE collapses to his knees in front of KABLE, glass-ey draining life... they are FACE to FACE. KABLE (cont'd) ... is the fuckin pose really necessary?
CASTLE face-plants on the COURT.
Sorry.
KABLE'S body relaxes; he tosses the knife across the floo then turns to face his family. When DELIA finally speaks there is a trace of CASTLE'S Georgia peach accent.
Are you my Daddy Tillman?

He gathers DELIA in his arms and lifts her off her feet, squeezing her close; she SQUEEZES BACK. KABLE grabs ANGIE with his other arm and pulls her in. The GEEKS look at one another - realize that their employ contract with CASTLE has just been terminated... shrug; pocket their shit, zip up their backpacks and fanny packs get up and start to file out.
Wait.
GEEK LEADER stops. KABLE (cont'd) Shut it off.
Pardon?
The nanex.     Set us free.
The GEEKS look at one another. KABLE (cont'd) It's nothing to you. A mouse- click.
GEEK LEADER shrugs.
True dat.
He nods to PONYTAIL GEEK: do it. The GEEK LEADER betrays a ghost of a smile. GEEK LEADER (cont'd) Well played, Kable.
KABLE doesn't answer; but his eyes say: how was any of th fucking game?
Mommy. Why did Daddy Tillman hurt Daddy Ken?

head_text.subj: A VIDEO PLAYER WINDOW POPS UP

text: It's TRACE, filming        herself.
This is for you, you dumb bitch.           I hope you do the right thing with it.

The IMAGE switches to the CAPTURED FOOTAGE of KABLE in th military facility... leading up to SCOTCH'S murder. The light from the screen reflects on GINA PARKER SMITH'S face - she's wide-eyed, stunned.
Oh, baby...

SHOOTING STARS fly past us in the dark... the SAME IMAGE STARTED WITH... only instead of an underground train carr SOLDIERS to battle... The TUNNEL ENDS; we break from the side of a mountain int BLUE SKY AND SUNLIGHT. KABLE is driving on the open highway... ANGIE is in the passenger seat, asleep, head pressed up against the windo glass. KABLE checks the rear view window; makes eye contact with DELIA, who is suspended in a lightweight car seat in the seat.
You good, sweetheart?

DELIA nods. KABLE allows himself a smile, puts his eyes back on the r ANGIE slowly reaches for KABLE'S hand, she rubs her thumb his tattoo - "I am right here with you" - and falls back asleep. The CAMERA tilts up, stares out the front window and move into the giant sun.
